TUKAD CEPUNG WATERFALL

TUKAD CEPUNG WATERFALL IS ONE OF THE BEAUTIFUL WATERFALL IN BALI WITH AMAZING VIEW

Tukad Cepung Waterfall is beautiful waterfall located in penida village, tembuku sub-district, bangli province. classified as a tourist attraction that was just introduced a few years ago, because the beauty of the waterfall makes this tourist attraction famous now. the scenery offered in this place is so beautiful, and you can swim in this place with really clear water with a calm atmosphere. Waterfall tourism objects are always in great demand by tourists who yearn for stunning natural beauty, including this Tukad Cepung waterfall tour, often used as a place for photo spots that produce photo objects that are very fitting, with the right lighting that will make you look beautiful. the photo looks so instagramable

History Tukad Cepung Waterfall

The history of the tukad cepung is that at first it was used by local residents as a place of cleansing or in Balinese terms known as melukat, while the melukat process is a process for purifying oneself and the soul from negative energy and negative things that can damage the mind and body. body, while the melukat process is a ritual process for Hindus in Bali whose purpose is to cleanse the body and soul spiritually. The tukad cepung waterfall was opened to the public in 2017, and tourists came here and uploaded the photos produced by the charm of this cepung waterfall on the internet, and finally many tourists were very curious to visit this place and finally this tukad cepung waterfall became very interesting. famous among photo lovers to upload to Instagram, and also nature lovers, especially waterfalls, where this waterfall presents a charm that is so enchantingly beautiful

Height Tukad Cepung Waterfall

Tukad Cepung Waterfall is a waterfall that has a height of about 15 meters. If you come to this waterfall in midday (not cloudy or raining) it will look like this waterfall falls from the sky because it is dazzled by sunlight. It is not surprising that this waterfall is then said to be a waterfall from the sky. The surrounding natural rocks, including tall cliffs overgrown with moss, plus lush tropical trees blending beautifully with the charm of Tukad Cepung Waterfall will certainly be able to make you amazed. With a height of 15 meters making the water fall down to be so beautiful, with the sound of gurgling water falling it makes the atmosphere very comfortable, the water discharge is not too large during the dry season, but during the rainy season the water flow here is very large, and makes it look very nice.

Unique of Tukad Cepung Waterfall

The word from tukad cepung waterfall, based on the words of local people who live around the waterfall, if the name tukad cepung already existed from the first time the waterfall was discovered, and based on local residents if the word tukad in English means river and cepung in language English means falling from the sky, so tukad cepung means a waterfall that falls from the sky. It is true if you visit this place during the day and you will see a waterfall like falling from the sky with water shining with the spark of light that makes this waterfall very beautiful. When you visit this place, you can look up where the water is falling, there you will see the water exposed to the sun which makes the water surface like twinkling and dazzling the eyes of the viewer, this is the uniqueness of this Tukad cepung waterfall. You can see for yourself this uniqueness and it is very suitable to be used as a photo object with lighting that is not too bright because the reflection of sunlight on the surface of the water, has created natural natural lighting.

Trek to Tukad Cepung Waterfall

The location of the waterfall is located a bit deep in the middle leading to the path and across the small river in this place, from the parking lot to the location it is quite far, it takes very good stamina to get to the location, from the ticket counter you will walk down a small path and there are stairs go down and cross a small river where this river is used as irrigation for the local people's rice fields, and when near the location there are stairs going down and from the stairs you walk to the location, this trip is about 30 minutes if your stamina is good, but fatigue will be paid off with the charm of the beauty of this waterfall. the terrain taken to reach the waterfall is not easy, from the parking lot to the waterfall we have to go through a slightly steep staircase and walk through a small river. In this way, it is not suitable for pregnant women, young children and people with asthma

Location of Tukad Cepung Waterfall

As for the location of the Tukad Cepung waterfall, it is located in Bangli Regency, precisely in Penida Village, Tembuku District. If you depart from Kuta to go to the Tukad Cepung Waterfall it will take about 1 hour 30 minutes, it is quite far from Kuta, if you depart from Ubud it will take about 45 minutes to reach the location of this Tukad Cepung Waterfall. Now there are many directions on the road that show the location of this waterfall, and you can also use google map to determine the location of this waterfall, so you won't get lost, and if you are confused to find this location, you can ask the residents local people who are here and they will show you directions to the location. If you don't want to explore on your own, we are ready to take you to the location of this beautiful Tukad Cepung waterfall

Facilities at Tukad Cepung Waterfall

The facilities at the Tukad Cepung Waterfall are quite complete, there is a very large car and motorbike parking area, so if you come here by car or motorbike, you don't need to hesitate to park your vehicle here, and there is also a toilet in the parking area. which is quite clean, and also on the road leading to the waterfall there is a small shop selling snacks, soft drinks and also young coconut water to refresh thirst after a tiring journey to the location of this waterfall. In the future, there may be some interesting facilities here, if you are on vacation on the island of Bali, you must visit this Tukad Cepung waterfall tourist attraction. The natural beauty of the waterfall will make you fascinated by the natural beauty
